text: Simone Pinzani (born 11 April 1972) is an Italian skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1994 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Italy Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1994 Winter Olympics Category:People from Cividale del Friuli
title: Simone Pinzani
